text: León (Llión in Leonese language) is a city and municipality in León province in the northwest of Spain. About 135,000 people live there. == History == León was in the capital of the Kingdom of León, an ancient country. == Language == Leonese language is taught in sixteen schools. == Gallery == Leon-Kathedrale-04-Suedwestturm-2001-gje.jpg Leon- Kathedrale-20-Westfassade-2001-gje.jpg Leon-Kathedrale-34-Westfassade-linkes Portal-Bettlerinnen-1996-gje.jpg Leon-Kathedrale-36-Westfassade-linkes Portal- Tympanon-1996-gje.jpg Leon-Kathedrale-50-Kreuzgang-Rosette-1996-gje.jpg Leon- Kathedrale-52-Kreuzgang-Turmspitzen-1996-gje.jpg Leon-04-Torbogen-1996-gje.jpg Leon-San Isidoro-02-Sued-2001-gje.jpg Leon-San Marcos-04-2001-gje.jpg ==Related pages== * Kingodom of León * Leonese language Category:Municipalities in the Kingdom of León Category:Capital cities in Spain
title: León, Spain
